net.oneandone.mork.compiler

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.oneandone.sushi.cli.Cli
      • net.oneandone.mork.compiler.Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.oneandone.sushi.cli.Command

    public class Main
extends net.oneandone.sushi.cli.Cli
implements net.oneandone.sushi.cli.Command
    Kick off code for the compiler, connects the Mork class with the operating system's command line. I.e it defines the main method. Knowledge about command line syntax goes here, not into the Mork class.
